rules_text:
Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, put a 1/1 green Insect creature token onto the battlefield.
{B}, Sacrifice an Insect: Put a +1/+1 counter on Tunneling Cragwyrm and regenerate it. [i](The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]Fresh feet in the jungle stir up the native critters. The native critters stir up the tunneling cragwyrms.[/i]
